title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The ImageAnalyzer example currently has scrollbars enabled, but they should be disabled.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, scrollbars are present.
EB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, scrollbars should not be visible.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Check if scrollbars are visible on the window.
